Package OOADHW2.CharacterFactory

Class GameCharacter

java.lang.Object
OOADHW2.CharacterFactory.GameCharacter
public class GameCharacter extends Object
This structure corresponds to the client structure in the factory design pattern. Keeps game characters in composition shape. Thus, loose coupling is ensured.
